skillsusa_district_web_design.title: SkillsUSA Web Design
skillsusa_district_web_design.description: Competed in the District SkillsUSA test at Greater Lowell Technical High School, winning 3rd place among the students within the district in Web Design.

skillsusa_inhouse_computer_programming.title: SkillsUSA Computer Programming
skillsusa_inhouse_computer_programming.description: Competed in the In-House SkillsUSA test at Greater Lowell Technical High School, scoring 1st place above every other IT student in Computer Programming.

skillsusa_inhouse_information_technology.title: SkillsUSA Information Technology Services
skillsusa_inhouse_information_technology.description: Competed in the In-House SkillsUSA test at Greater Lowell Technical High School, scoring 2nd place among every other IT student in Information Technology Services.

skillsusa_inhouse_cybersecurity.title: SkillsUSA Cybersecurity
skillsusa_inhouse_cybersecurity.description: Competed in the In-House SkillsUSA test at Greater Lowell Technical High School, scoring 3rd place among every other IT student in Cybersecurity.

skillsusa_inhouse_internetworking.title: SkillsUSA Internetworking
skillsusa_inhouse_internetworking.description: Competed in the In-House SkillsUSA test at Greater Lowell Technical High School, scoring 3rd place among every other IT student in Internetworking.

gltech_special_recognition.title: Special Recognition
gltech_special_recognition.description: Was chosen for the Special Recognition award for my performance in Information Technology during my Sophomore year.

gltech_honor_rolls.title: Honor Rolls
gltech_honor_rolls.description: Earned Honor Roll recognition throughout high school: - Freshmen Year: Terms 2 & 4 - Sophomore Year: Term 2

gltech_high_honor_rolls.title: High Honor Rolls
gltech_high_honor_rolls.description: Earned High Honor Roll recognition throughout high school: - Freshmen Year: Terms 1 & 3 - Sophomore Year: Terms 3 & 4
